issue.summary: Contact Email from Web Page: Ambigouous Base in chr. 3
issue.description: AF152363.1 is a reference component that contains non-nucleotide characters.
issue.resolution_text: Non-A/C/T/G/N characters are accounted for as valid IUPAC code.

issue.summary: GeneID: 80852 (GRIP2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Reference component AC090952.3 has a 1 nt deletion that affects the translation of NM_001080423.2.
issue.resolution_text: ABBA01025158.1 has been added to the Chr. 3 Reference for GRCh38, patching this single nucleotide deletion to correct the representation of GeneID: 80852 (GRIP2) NM_001080423.2.

issue.summary: Chrom 3 Pre-Telomere Gap
issue.description: Chromosome 3 sequence does not extend into p telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: AC215221.2 has been sequenced and added to GRCh38 chromosome 3, extending into telomeric repeat.

issue.summary: Chrom 3 Pre-Telomere Gap
issue.status_text: A gap has been added between AC073135.3 and the telomere, and we will search for a clone to sequence here.
issue.description: Chromosome 3 sequence does not extend into q telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in assembly
issue.description: The ambiguous IUPAC bases (M, R) in AF152363.1will be replaced with individual base codes or Ns.
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoints have been changed to use the sequence of AC096917.3 through its overlap with AF152363.1 in order to replace ambiguous IUPAC bases (M, R) in AF152363.1 with individual base codes.

issue.summary: Assignment of AL590523 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.status_text: AL590523 has been placed on the Chr. 3 Unl TPF.
issue.description: AL590523 has been placed on the Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assignment of AL592170 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: AL592170 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: AL592170.21 has been removed from the reference as redundant within component AC108724.4 of NC_000003.11

issue.summary: GeneID: 115286 (SLC25A26), assembly gap
issue.description: A piece of the transcript NM_173471.2 are not represented in the reference assembly due to an assembly gap.
issue.resolution_text: AC170165.1 has been added to the TPF extending into the gap, and this fosmid contains the missing pieces of the transcript NM_173471.2

issue.summary: GeneID: 56667 (MUC13), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a difference between RefSeq NM_033049.3 (MUC13) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket reports the same discrepancy as HG-932. Investigation of this discrepancy will be tracked in HG-932.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC204971.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383526.1 created to capture sequence from AC204971.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383526.1 created to capture sequence from AC204971.4 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: GeneID: 200959 (GABRR3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: GRCh37 appears to be representing a minor allele at NC_000003.11:97726747 (SNP rs832032), resulting in the representation of a non-functional version of the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_001105580.2 (GABRR3).
issue.resolution_text: Mincontig KF459624.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 3 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 200959 (GABRR3) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Ambiguity code in assembly
issue.description: There is an "M" in the sequence of AF152363.1.
issue.resolution_text: We will replace the ambiguity codes with the individual base codes. This action is being tracked in linked ticket HG-1091.

issue.summary: GeneID: 23429 (RYBP), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Some sequence of NM_012234.4 does not align to the reference assembly suggesting a deletion in the reference assembly at this locus or a small gap between two adjacent clones.
issue.resolution_text: AC255560.1 CH17-345B22 has been sequenced and submitted and contains a small insertion that provides more complete representation for GeneID: 23429 (RYBP). GRCh38 Chr3 component AC104435.3 has been removed as redundant.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100131827 (ZNF717), order and orientation
issue.status_text: An additional CH17 clone has been selected for sequencing.
issue.description: The alignment between AC108724.4 and AC133123.3 is comprised entirely of repeat; the join should be reviewed for validity.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 100302657 (DDX11L3), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: Some subtelomeric sequence is missing from the Chr. 3 telomere that likely includes this gene.
issue.description: GeneID: 100302657 (DDX11L3), represented by AM992865.2, is missing from NC_000003.11.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: FANCD2 Paralog Sequence Missing from Reference
issue.description: FANCD-2 paralog sequence may be missing from the current reference.
issue.resolution_text: There is supporting evidence for the reference at this location, but AC226154 contains a bit of sequence that may represent the missing exons of a potential FANCD2 paralog and has been added as a contained clone within AC090958 as a NOVEL patch.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC170801.2 and AC170165.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-711.
issue.resolution_text: AEKP01024816.1 spans the gap between AC170801 and AC235952.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between components AC188788.1 and AC174158.3. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-712.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AUXG01000023.1 spans the gap between Chr. 3 components AC188788.1 and AC174158.3 for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC024937.21 - AC069257.28 region in Chr. 3.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: May not be representing the best allele for clinical labs at SCN5A
issue.status_text: There is currently no example sequence for the 1* allele.
issue.description: The version of SCN5A represented in the current reference assembly may not represent the best allele for clinical testing.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: HuRef sequence has been identified that may extend toward the chr. 3 centromere from component AC144764.4.
issue.resolution_text: HuRef Sequences ABBA01004652.1, ABBA01004653.1, ABBA01004654.1, ABBA01004655.1, and ABBA01004656.1, and NA12878 WGS contigs AEKP01209350.1 and AEKP01209353.1 have been added, extending towards the centromere from NC_000003.11 component AC144764.4.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC069213.22 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC069213.22 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC069213.22 will be used through its overlap with AC091633.22 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC134507.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description:
Assembly component AC134507.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly.
decoyacc_start: 108915 decoyacc_stop: 110007
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC134507.2 will be used through its overlap with AC134099.2 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC134772.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly.
issue.description: Assembly component AC134772.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly.

issue.description: Assembly component AC139766.15 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC139766.15 will be used through its overlap with AC138390.2 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 25981 (DNAH1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_015512.3 (DNAH1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The reference sequence here is well supported and will not be changed. This is believed to be either a very rare base or an error in the cDNA that spurred the report.

issue.summary: PRIM2 copy missing from peri-centromeric region
issue.description: Copy of PRIM2 missing from peri-centromeric region of chr. 3 in GRCh37
issue.resolution_text: Component NW_001839364.1 has been added to the Chr. 3 TPF and should contain the missing copy of PRIM2.

issue.summary: HuRef Sequence may extend into the Centromere Gap
issue.description: ABBA01026974.1 extends toward the Centomere from component AC144562.5.
issue.resolution_text: HuRef Sequence ABBA01026974.1 has been added, extending towards the centromere from NC_000003.11 component AC144562.5.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC239646.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC239646.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC239646.4 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.resolution_text: The decoy contained in AC018501.9 is entirely composed of contamination, so this clone will not be added as an ALT_LOCI.

issue.summary: GeneID: 1795 (DOCK3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: A piece of the transcript NM_004947.3 is inverted relative to Reference component AC099047.2.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC131013.2 will be used instead of AC099047.2 through the region of overlap to represent the correct orientation of this piece of sequence by curating the switchpoints.

issue.summary: GeneID: 200958 (MUC20), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text:
Several clones were introduced as alt_loci in GRCh38 that contain either 3 or 4 copies of this repeat to capture 1kG ph1 decoy sequence. The JIRA tickets, clone accessions, and ALT RefSeq accessions are as follows: HG-1774, AC237028.3, NT_187649.1; HG-1781, AC236675.3, NT_187688.1; HG-1783, AC237041.3, NT_187690.1; HG-1787, AC237104.4, NT_187691.1.
The RP11 clone in the primary assembly, component AC233280.2, contains 12 copies (NC_000003.12:195,725,121-195,725,800) . RP11 is believed to be heterozygous for 6/12 copies of this repeat. This ticket will remain open, awaiting an SAB decision on which allele should be represented in the primary assembly in CNV/genic regions.
issue.description: Discrepancies between NM_152673.1 and the reference assembly (AC069513.28) may be caused by CNV of repeat or a misassembly to artificially expand the repeat.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AL354926.17 Replaces Part of HuRef Scaffold NW_001839364.1
issue.description: AL354926.17 should be added to the Chr. 3 centromeric region, replacing ABBA01000933.1 and ABBA01000934.1.
issue.resolution_text: AL354926.17 has been added to the Chr. 3 centromeric region, replacing GRCh38 components ABBA01000933.1 and ABBA01000934.1.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC124045.2
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC124045.2
issue.resolution_text: NC_000003.12 RP11 component AC124045.2 contains a 1.3kb sequence inversion error confirmed by RP11 Illumina whole genome sequence. A portion of this clone has been replaced by AC092046.2, also from the RP11 library, which contains this sequence in the correct orientation.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP006240.1
issue.status_text: This discrepancy is being investigated to determine whether it may be variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267206.1 along with alignment of HuRef chr. 3, suggest there may be ~1,679 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AP006240.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 3081 (HGD), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113881(component: AC009289.8) may be redundant to existing sequence in reference chromosome 3
issue.resolution_text: NT_113881 (AC009289.8) has been verified to be redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC138972.8
issue.description: Analysis of GU266815.1 along with alignment of HuRef chr. 3, suggest there may be ~2,347 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC138972.8. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC117391.8
issue.description: Analysis of GU266909.1, GU267792.1, GU268714.1, GU267502.1, GU268913.1, GU267138.1, GU267400.1, and GU268299.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 3, suggest there may be ~7,515 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC117391.8. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (Y) in NC_000003.12: 66186453 and 66191221 in component AEKP01024816.1.
issue.resolution_text: AUXG01000021.1 replaces NC_000003.12 component AEKP01024816.1 in order to remove the two IUPAC ambiguity codes found in that component.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (W) in NC_000003.12: 90549739 in component AEKP01209353.1.
issue.resolution_text: AUXG01000382.1 replaces NC_000003.12 components AEKP01209353.1 and ABBA01004654.1 to remove an IUPAC ambiguity code at NC_000003.12:90,549,739 and close the small gap between ABBA01004654.1 and ABBA01004655.1

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC068299.21
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC068299.21
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 201625 (DNHD2), missing in assembly
issue.description: Some sequence of NM_178504.3 is not aligned to the reference assembly, suggesting a deletion in the reference assembly at this locus.
issue.resolution_text: We have sequenced fosmids AC232304.3 and AC231288.2 and placed them as contained clones to cover the deletion/misassembly in AC121250.2 and represent the missing sequence, including the previously unrepresented first 1150 nts of NM_178504.3. This issue is a duplicate of HG-280.

issue.summary: GeneID: 727811 (LOC727811), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113884 (component: U95626.1) may be redundant to existing sequence in reference chromosome 3
issue.resolution_text: NT_113884 (U95626.1) has been verified to be redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Comparison to Chimp and Venter suggest missing sequence in reference
issue.description: Comparison to Chimp and Venter suggest missing sequence in reference.
issue.resolution_text: We have sequenced fosmids AC232304.3 and AC231288.2 and placed them as contained clones to cover the deletion/misassembly in AC121250.2 and represent the missing sequence.

issue.summary: GeneID: 2199 (FBLN2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001998.2 (FBLN2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695211 has been submitted as a patch for this error.

issue.summary: GeneID: 6854 (SYN2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_133625.3 (SYN2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig ABBA01025208.1 has been added to the Chr. 3 Reference, patching component AC022234.4, and improving representation for GeneID: 6854 (SYN2) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7508 (XPC), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004628.3 (XPC) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR products FJ695191 and FJ695192 have been submitted as patches to correct these errors.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7869 (SEMA3B), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004636.2 (SEMA3B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The old reference component, U73167.1, has been replaced with U90094.1 which represents RefSeq NM_004636.2 (SEMA3B) perfectly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10991 (SLC38A3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_006841.4 (SLC38A3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459627.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 3 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 10991 (SLC38A3) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 25907 (TMEM158), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_015444.2 (TMEM158) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695198 has been submitted as a patch for these errors.

issue.summary: GeneID: 26084 (SGEF), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_015595.2 (SGEF) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695204 has been submitted as a patch for this error.

issue.summary: GeneID: 6259 (RYK), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_002958.3 (RYK) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AMYH02007719.1 has been added to the Chr. 3 Reference, patching component AC096967.18 to update two bases to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 6259 (RYK) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Alignment between AC091633.22 and AC069213.22 missing from database
issue.description: Poor quality alignment between components AC091633.22 and AC069213.22
issue.resolution_text: The correct alignment has been generated and uploaded, and the certificate has been approved.

issue.summary: GeneID: 9922 (IQSEC1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: The reference sequence may have a 1nt insertion relative to NM_001134382.1
issue.resolution_text: WGS minicontig KF495709.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 3 Reference, patching this single nucleotide insertion to correct the representation for GeneID: 9922 (IQSEC1) NM_001134382.1 in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113883 appears redundant to reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113883 appears redundant to sequence on reference chromosome 3.
issue.resolution_text: NT_113883 (AC092036.3) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113882 appears redundant to reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113882 appears redundant to reference chromosome 3.
issue.resolution_text: NT_113882 (AC025613.14) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: multiple indels and subs in CpG island on AC091491.3 affect PLCL2 gene
issue.description: multiple indels and subs in CpG island on human chr3 BAC AC091491.3 affect translation of the PLCL2 gene.
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate of the issue reported in HG-772.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145425.5 and AC092034.2
issue.resolution_text: Sequence has been added to extend into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1294.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC117469.3 and AC125362.6
issue.resolution_text: Components AC188788.1 and AC174158.3 extend into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1295.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC069213.22 and AC069513.28
issue.resolution_text: AC233280.2 (RP11-141C7) has been finished and placed in the TPF, spanning this gap.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10533 (ATG7), missing in assembly
issue.description: Possible assembly error or missing sequence from the overlap between AC083855.3 and AC020750.4 affecting ATG7 (GeneID: 10533)
issue.resolution_text: The missing piece of sequence exists in the overlap from Build 36 positions 11289102-11289115.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7873 (ARMET), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Discrepancy in the alignment of the RefSeq for ARMET (NM_006010.2) to genomic component AC092037.2 affects coding sequence.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459625.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 3 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 7873 (MANF) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: substitution in chr3 BAC AC124916.3 in MAP4 gene
issue.description: A substitution (G to C) in chr3 BAC AC124916.3 in a coding exon of the MAP4 gene changes a Serine into a Cysteine.
issue.resolution_text: Incorrect report -- The genome agrees with the transcripts at the position in question.

issue.summary: GeneID: 23228 (PLCL2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Several mismatches in the alignment of the RefSeq for PLCL2 (NM_001144382.1) to genomic component AC091491.3.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AEKP01168581.1 has been added to the Chr. 3 Reference to update these bases to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 23228 (PLCL2) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: possible gap in AC069259.14 containing 5' UTR exon of FNDC3B gene
issue.description: Human chr3 BAC AC069259.14 possibly misses some sequence representing an alternative 5' UTR exon of the FNDC3B gene.
issue.resolution_text: The current reference component AC069259.14 is supported by other sequence through this region and does contain the piece of sequence in question.

issue.summary: G to A substitution in BAC AC115284.4 affecting gene PARP3.
issue.description: A G to A substitution in BAC AC115284.4 affects the translation of gene PARP3, changing an Arg into a His. All cDNAs and ESTs containing the base disagree with the genome.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459622.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 3 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 10039 (PARP3).

issue.summary: GeneID: 6533 (SLC6A6), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There are eight single base in/dels in the alignment of NM_003043.3 to reference component AC093496.2
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AEKP01055341.1 has been added to the Chr. 3 Reference to correct these bases and improve representation for GeneID: 6533 (SLC6A6) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: MANF gene shows SNP in start codon, might represent minor allele
issue.description:
The MANF gene possibly represents a minor allele. Please compare JIRA entry CCDS-404:
The start codon is AGG and this contains a SNP, rs13091931, in dbSNP130 which is G/T. In some individuals therefore, this is an ATG codon. All the mRNAs that extend this far have ATG so the AGG is probably the minor allele. The AGG is found in chimp, gorilla, orangutan and Rhesus macaque so maybe the allele with ATG at this position is only found in humans.
There's currently a discussion between Ensembl/Vega, UCSC and NCBI to change this start to a downstream ATG. Maybe we should check the ref sequence throroughly before a CCDS is changed due to a possibly minor allele.
issue.resolution_text: We will track the decisions regarding the representation of this allele in HG-766

issue.summary: 3 bp genomic deletion in MUC13 gene
issue.description: A group of unvalidated snps mark the genomic deletion of 3bp in the coding region of the MUC13 gene. Not supported by any transcript or other human or other species genomes.
issue.resolution_text: WGS minicontig KF573700.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 3 Reference, patching this three nt deletion and improving the representation for MUC13 in GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 55802 (DCP1A), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Reference component AC097015.2 contains a 6nt insertion relative to transcript BC007439.2 and overlapping reference component AC112218.2.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC112218.2, which better represents this gene will be used through this overlap.

issue.summary: Chr. 3 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC145425.5 and AC092034.2.
issue.resolution_text: A 27.27kb extension into this gap since GRCh37 was released as a FIX patch for GRCh37: GL383525.1.
